Text: Those that believe the absurd official conspiracy theory put forth by Bush appointees are an overwhelming minority now in the US. Of course you won't hear about it in the war-profiteer controlled mainstream news. You never do in false flag operations. People are really starting to wake up in the US and it's long overdue! And the reason we don't hear from more whistleblowers is because of what happens to whistleblowers: They get killed, discredited, declared insane, ridiculed or paid off. Susan speaks the truth. Will you hear it, hide it or deny it in fear and anger?
